entries.title: Gameplay Improvements & Arena Update
entries.text:
- Reworked the "Grump Rock" Arena with layout improvements and gameplay adjustments 
- Added a Speedrun Timer toggle in the Options menu 
- The game now tracks total player deaths and displays them on the end screen 
- Moved a Cooler inside the "Grump Rock" arena to improve respawn flow 
- Rebalanced Crystal Crawlers (reduced health and fixed respawn delay) 
- Adjusted Spear Guard knockback distance 
- Added an additional Patrolling Shroom enemy 
- Fixed a bug where standing below gold could push the player into the tilemap 
- Adjusted bounce height for one of the mushrooms 
- Updated an overlooked area with additional sprites and tiles for improved visuals

entries.title: Adjustments and Fixes
entries.text:
- Gump Rock now has increased health and improved movement speed 
- Time Dialled state should now work reliably 
- Adjusted background colors to feel more distant and less visually distracting 
- Rebalanced Spear Guard health 
- Fixed a bounce mushroom that was slightly misaligned 
- Added back the missing fade in the main menu

entries.title: Hotfix
entries.text:
- Fixed an issue that caused the main menu title to look weird 
- Gold can now be picked up correctly after death 
- The size of the trigger for the cavern safe point has been increased

entries.title: Hotfix
entries.text:
- Fixed fullscreen handling to reduce brief taskbar/desktop flashes during gameplay 
- Adjusted the knockback of the Spear Gaurd 
- Bosses now stay in the stunned state for a bit longer when parried 
- Cursor now hides on game start and shows when the pause menu opens

entries.title: Update
entries.text:
- Completed Crystal Caverns 
- Added new enemies and bosses 
- Introduced new player mechanics 
- Implemented a main menu and pause menu 
- Fixed bugs and improved performance
